titles.title: A bill to extend the suspension of duty on phosphoric acid, tris (2-ethylhexyl) ester.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/7/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on phosphoric acid, tris (2-ethylhexyl) ester.
